details.title: Keys to automate supply chains with smart labels
details.abstract: RFID technology is a popular research topic for both academia and industrial practitioners in recent years. However, most published articles focus on the technology itself and seldom discuss the implementation issues of RFID-based systems. This article sets out to fill this gap by proposing some key aspects to automate RFID-enabled systems, in particular supply chains
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
